name: 3.1 3.2 Gain Lose
prompt: Last session US Top 3 gainer & loser stocks. For each stock: close price, daily gain (%), YTD gain (%), and reason.

name: 5.1 Major IB Updates
prompt: List today's top 10 most significant Investment Bank (IB) updates, including the Bank, Ticker, Action, and New Price Target.

name: 6.3 Dark Pool
prompt: Last session US dark pool & block trades and, if available, political donation flows: key tickers, notional value/size, notable counterparties, and any political contribution patterns impacting market sentiment.

name: 7.1 11 GICS Sector
prompt: Today's (MM/DD) 11 GICS sector(ETF's) performance & Day % & YTD % & 1-line driver comment & Valuation (e.g., P/E TTM) & Key Sector Rotation Themes

name: 8.1 12 Key Tickers
prompt: Today's performance for AAPL, MSFT, NVDA, AMZN, GOOGL, META, AVGO, CRWD, NFLX, NOW, TSLA, PLTR & Day % & YTD % & a specific, 1-paragraph summary for each ticker citing its key driver
